title: Will it ever tell me on PBE ?
body:
> i've applied for **PBE** for like almost 2 months and i didn't get any answer either i got accepted or i didn't and _if i didn't get accepted what do i need to be accepted ?_

it just tells me **Application received **

replies.body:
PBE invites are typically sent out in batches, and acceptance is determined by criteria that change quite a bit. Generally, we look for *really active players* who are a positive influence on the community and would give great feedback. Sometimes if we're testing a specific thing, let's say a Ryze rework, we'd send out a batch of invites to some Ryze mains.

Check out our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for more information on the system. Let me know if you have any questions.
